Class SearchService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gabrielgiordano.ttm.service.SearchService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchInterface<SearchElementBean>

    @Service
public class SearchService
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchInterface<SearchElementBean>
    The Service class for the search functionality.
    Author:
    Gabriel Giordano
